version_description:
Hey there,
In this version, I fixed a layout issue when you tried to edit a flashcard.

If you like using the app, please rate it in the app store and if you have any suggestion please email me@matekovacs.com or message me on twitter @kovacsamate!

In this version, I added dark mode support to the app and I fixed a few small bugs with the application.
If you like using the app, please rate it in the app store and if you have any suggestion please email me@matekovacs.com or message me on twitter @kovacsamate!
